properties.name: clp.avatar.max.size
properties.description: Max size in KB for avatars(default to 2MB = 2097152Bytes).

properties.name: clp.file.max.size
properties.description: Max size in KB for uploaded files(default to 100MB = 104,857,600Bytes).

properties.name: clp.test.input.file.path
properties.description: File path for OJ Test Inputs.

properties.name: clp.test.output.file.path
properties.description: File path for OJ Test Outputs.
